text:
Hi. Hope you are doing well. This is Joseph from United States.
As a Senior Full-Stack Developer with years of experience in web development, I am really interested in working with companies.
I am  familiar with C/C++, Java, C#, and JavaScript frameworks like React.js, Vue.js, Node.js, and AngularJS as well.
Could you please provide me a new opportunity?
Best regards.

[FOR HIRE] [REMOTE] [Part-Time / Full-Time / Contract] [FRONT END DEVELOPMENT] [FULL STACK DEVELOPMENT]
Hello.
This is Shuvo, I am from Bangladesh.
I’m a senior full stack web developer for 5+ years of experiences. Passionate about pushing the tech industry and new idea forward by working with my skills and experience. I always love to learn new cutting edge technologies and overcome challenges. Available 40 hours per week, fully remote in several time zones.

Linkedin: <https://www.linkedin.com/in/sar333/>
Github: <https://github.com/neutral-Stage>
Personal Website: <http://shuvoanirbanroy.com/>

- Any popular headless CMS such as Sanity, Strapi, Prismic, GraphCMS

Ready to start work immediately!
